mdRecord.dcterms:description: The following text is printed on the artifact: "Bausch & Lomb Optical Co.", "Rochester, N.Y.", and "Patented Aug. 24, '97". The instrument case has the following text printed on the inside: "Arthur H. Thomas Company".
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
